c:facetType.name: LinesAndDotsPlotFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the lines and dots plot facet.

c:property.name: dotsVisible
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the visual elements show dots/markers in each point's position.

c:property.name: linesVisible
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the visual elements are connected with lines.

c:property.name: showDots
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. Indicates if the visual elements show dots/markers in each point's position.

c:property.name: showLines
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. Indicates if the visual elements are connected with lines.
